trans-unit.source: User fields to display after opt-in (optional)
Please enter your e-mail address to subscribe to the newsletter "%s".
Validation of form data failed. Please correct the marked fields and submit again.
Thank you for registering. We have sent you a confirmation e-mail. Please click the link in this e-mail to complete the registration process.

Thank you for registering for the newsletter "%1$s". To complete the registration process, please click the link below:

%2$s

If you didn't register for this newsletter, please ignore this e-mail.

You are already subscribed to the newsletter "%1$s". If you like to edit your user information or unsubscribe, please click the link below:

%2$s

You are already subscribed to the newsletter "%1$s". If you like to unsubscribe, please click the link below:

%2$s
The confirmation link provided is invalid. If you copied the link from your e-mail client, please make sure that you selected the whole link.
Your subscription was successfully confirmed. You will receive further issues of the newsletter "%s".
If you wish to receive a personalized newsletter, please update your personal data.
Your personal data was updated successfully.
Your personal data was could not be updated. Please try again.
Your subscription was cancelled successfully and your personal data was removed from our system.
Your subscription could not be cancelled. Please make sure you used a valid unsubscribe link. If the problem persists, please contact us for further assistance.
